HiddenText.Name: I have a student who completed my class but was not on my grade sheet. How can I give this student credit?
HiddenText.OpenningText: I have a student who completed my class but was not on my grade sheet. How can I give this student credit?
HiddenText.BodyCopy: Send an e-mail to: onlinelearning@byui.edu. Be sure to include: Student Name & I-Number (found on my.byui), Course & Section Number, Semester, & Desired Grade.
